displayName.text: Christopher Martin, Esq., Real Estate Broker

formattedAddress: 400 West End Ave #1F, New York, NY 10024, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Christopher Martin, Esq., Real Estate Broker

adrFormatAddress: 400 West End Ave #1F, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: I had the privilege of having Christopher Martin as my lawyer during the process of purchasing my very first apartment, and I cannot express my gratitude enough for his exceptional service. He went above and beyond to make sure that every aspect of the transaction was a smooth process and through this process, he patiently explained every document, addressing all my concerns and questions. His commitment to protecting my interests was evident throughout the entire journey and I am forever grateful. I highly recommend Christopher Martin as a lawyer. His dedication and expertise make him stand out in the field. Thank you so much for everything!

originalText.text: Chris is everything you could possibly want in a broker and more. He outlined all our options, listened and responded to our likes and dislikes, and carefully guided us through buying our first real estate in New York City. The very definition of grace under pressure, Chris stays calm and kept us calm. The only time we didn't listen to him we made a big mistake. With great success and without judgement, Chris skillfully extracted us and got us back on track. His legal expertise gives him a further edge over competitors. Most of all, we learned that Chris genuinely cares, your happiness is more important to him than making money. And to top it all, he has a great sense of humor!

originalText.text: I worked with Chris while looking to buy my first apartment and could not recommend him enough. Chris was an engaging, supporting and thorough attorney who did a phenomenal job advising me through all the steps for securing my first apartment. I would call him numerously to ask questions and clarifications and he always available to answer all of my inquiries. I happily closed last month and settled and could not have asked for better support on the legal side. Thanks Chris!

originalText.text: Chris Martin is a lawyer and a real estate broker. He assisted me as broker when I bought my apartment and as real estate attorney when I sold. He is knowledgeable, returns phone calls and is easy to spend time with. I recommend him highly and would definitely use him again.

text.text: Chris Martin is a lawyer and a real estate broker. He assisted me as broker when I bought my apartment and as real estate attorney when I sold. He is knowledgeable, returns phone calls and is easy to spend time with. I recommend him highly and would definitely use him again.

originalText.text: Chris was recommended to us for a home closing and boy were we lucky! We were first-time buyers and unsure about so many things in the process. Chris was helpful and quick-to-respond to our questions and had experience in co-ops, which was a plus with their additional processes, documents, and shares. Friendly and to-the-point, Chris helped us and our agent close right on time – the whole process offer to closing took just three months. Can't recommend him strongly enough!
